features: The screen protector provides the maximum protection for the Samsung Galaxy S22 touchscreen. The space between Samsung Galaxy S22 and the screen protector enables the proper space for the installation of most phone cases.
⚠ NOT COMPATIBLE WITH : Samsung Galaxy S22 Plus, Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra
Made with high quality 0.26mm thick premium tempered glass with rounded edges. Extremely high hardness: resists scratches up to 9H
High response and high transparency. Dust-free, fingerprint-free, one-push super easily installation, bubble free

NEW'C Samsung Galaxy S22 Tempered Glass Screen Protector, delicate touch: coated on the back with a solid silicon adhesive which makes installation easy and attaches the film firmly so as not to affect the sensitivity of the touch screen

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing quality and durability
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the NEW'C [3 Pack] Tempered Glass Screen Protector for my Samsung Galaxy S22 Plus, and I must say, I'm impressed. The package comes with three protectors, providing great value for the price.Installation was a breeze, thanks to the case-friendly design that perfectly aligns with the phone's screen. The tempered glass feels sturdy and durable, offering reliable protection against scratches and minor impacts. I appreciate the clarity and touch sensitivity it maintains, allowing for a seamless user experience.The ultra-resistant feature truly lives up to its name. Daily use hasn't resulted in any visible scratches or marks on the protector, keeping my phone screen in pristine condition. It doesn't interfere with the phone's display quality, ensuring vibrant colors and sharp visuals.As someone always on the move, the NEW'C screen protector has proven to be an essential addition to my device. Its durability, easy installation, and reliable performance make it a top choice for anyone looking to safeguard their Samsung Galaxy S22 Plus. I highly recommend the NEW'C screen protector for a worry-free and protected smartphone experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Price - Good Proctectors - No Problems
reviews.reviewText: Arrived promptly and intact. They are for Galaxy S21 5G. As others have said, they are slightly smaller than the screen, but I have never had one that was exact. My phone case covers any difference, so that is not an issue. Assuming everyone has put a screen protector on, it is super easy to do and takes seconds after set-up. Clean the glass, put on the protector and you're done; there's nothing complicated about it.The fingerprint reader works through it, but as others, it's not perfect so you might have to press a little harder than you normally would. No big deal, it's not like Andy Griffith had to deal with; a two piece phone and a couple of cords attached to it, not to mention a wall. It's not inconvenient, just push on it and it will get there.I'm not sure you can tell what you're getting, so I can just leave you with that they work and there are 3 of them (there are 2 in the photo because I used one). With my use, they should last a year or two collectively, if not for the life of the phone while I own it. I usually break one within days of putting it on, then I leave it that way for 4 months or whatever, so in theory, they could last forever!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great screen protector, works with fingerprint scanner
reviews.reviewText: I was reluctant to use tempered glass for my S22 Plus with many reviews stating that the fingerprint scanner won't work after installation. Installation foe this was simple, the same as all tempered glass. Make sure to clean it, and use the dust tape piece to remove any visible dust, particles, hair, etc. Fitment was good, and right after installation I tried using the fingerprint and it still worked (like someone else mentioned, you press down a little bit harder). So I ended up following the instructions, deleting my old fingerprints and redoing them. Also, remember to turn on Touch Sensitivy for screen protectors in your Settings. The touch screen and fingerprint both work perfectly now. Just remember to follow instructions, re-register your fingerprints, and turn on Touch Sensitivity! Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product, bad execution
reviews.reviewText: The screen protector itself is great so far. It fit perfect on my phone but I'm giving it 4 stars because first there was no instructions in English included. For someone who hasn't put on a screen protector before it could be confusing. Secondly, the wet and dry wipes that are included were horrible. After using the wet wipe on my screen, I used the dry wipe and it kept smudging all over my screen. I eventually had to use a different wipe just to get all the smudges off. Other than those 2 issues, its a good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Improved Quality of Life
reviews.reviewText: This is the best purchase I've made in a long time. After months of annoyances with an old screen protector, I finally replaced it and am so glad I did. This was within my budget, easy to apply (it practically applied itself), and is just so dang pretty in how you don't even see it. This is a solid, economical choice that made my life better and hopefully will enhance yours as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit and works well with touch screen
reviews.reviewText: Easy to apply. Works well with the fingerprint reader.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Totally saved my phone
reviews.reviewText: Just lost my phone at the local car wash. Upon return, my phone was obviously damaged. Looking at it, screen was completely shattered, only.... it wasn't my screen but this protector!!! Screen is undamaged!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this screen protector! It was so easy to put on and everything works with it on including fingerprint recognition. I love that it doesn't show fingerprints too. Phenomenal! Very happy customer.
Los dedos se marcan mucho y se ve constantemente sucioDespués de unas semanas se despega de las esquinas

I have had this screen protector on my phone for a few months and dropped it here and there with no issues. Had my first big drop a couple days ago, with my phone falling 3 feet or so onto gravel, facedown. The screen protector had a chip, and cracks stemming from that, but the screen underneath was unscathed. I attempted to attach the 2nd screen protector in the package but it didnt work quite right, so I used the third one, and was a little more careful this time. Good as new. I see they are less than half what I paid initially so I have ordered another pack, in case I need them again. It was kind of tricky finding a screen protector for my Samsung S21 fe 5g, but this one fits perfect and works very well.

reviews.reviewTitle: Schneller, zuverlässiger Versand. Leichte Handhabung des Panzer Glas
reviews.reviewText: Schneller, zuverlässiger Versand. Leichte Handhabung des Panzer Glas

Ottime pellicole appena installate facile installazione si adattano perfettamente zero bolle.Ho pulito il display, staccato la pellicola dal vetro temperato, l'ho posizionato sul display dello smartphone ed ho esercitato una leggera pressione al centro e in alto ed in basso per far uscire l'aria sottostante. Il vetro si è attaccato perfettamente.La prima sensazione mi sembrata buona, a quanto pare il sensore di impronte non ne abbia risentito molto.
